name: The Pride Hotel
description: The Pride Hotel is a luxury hotel located on Wardha Road, Nagpur. It offers spacious rooms, fine dining restaurants and leisure travelers.

name: Radisson Blu Hotel Nagpur
description: Radisson Blu Hotel Nagpur is a contemporary hotel situated on Wardha Road, Nagpur. It features elegant rooms and multiple dining options

name: Tuli International Hotel
description: Tuli International Hotel is a boutique hotel located in Sadar, Nagpur. It offers comfortable accommodation, a rooftop restaurant with city views, and easy access to Nagpur's attractions.

name: Hotel Centre Point
description: Hotel Centre Point is located in the heart of Ramdaspeth, Nagpur. It features modern rooms, a rooftop swimming pool, and a fitness center.

name: Hotel Airport Centre Point
description: Hotel Airport Centre Point is conveniently located near Nagpur Airport on Wardha Road. It offers comfortable accommodation and easy access to transportation links.

name: Hotel Hardeo
description: Hotel Hardeo is a budget-friendly hotel located in Sitabuldi, Nagpur. It offers affordable accommodation, a restaurant serving Indian cuisine, and friendly service.

name: Hotel Blue Diamond
description: Hotel Blue Diamond is situated on Wardha Road, Nagpur. It offers comfortable rooms, a multi-cuisine restaurant, and banquet facilities for events and functions.

name: Hotel Siddhartha Inn
description: Hotel Siddhartha Inn is located in Ganeshpeth, Nagpur. It provides budget accommodation, a vegetarian restaurant, and convenient access to nearby attractions.

name: Hotel Ashok
description: Hotel Ashok is situated in the bustling area of Ramdaspeth, Nagpur. It offers comfortable rooms, a rooftop terrace, and personalized services for guests.

name: Hotel The Nagpur Ashok
description: Hotel The Nagpur Ashok is located on Wardha Road, Nagpur. It features well-appointed rooms, a swimming pool, and a fitness center for guests' convenience.

name: Hotel Centre Palace
description: Hotel Centre Palace is situated in the heart of Sitabuldi, Nagpur. It offers comfortable accommodation, a rooftop restaurant, and easy access to shopping and dining options.

name: Hotel President
description: Hotel President is a modern hotel located in Sadar, Nagpur. It features contemporary rooms, a fitness center, and a restaurant serving a variety of cuisines.
